alert.note: Alert for Wilkes; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 3:09PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wilkes and western Yadkin Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Windy Gap, or 7 miles southeast of Wilkesboro, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilkesboro... Windy Gap... Buck Shoals... Brooks Crossroads... Clingman... Lone Hickory... and Arlington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
